forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 17C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 62F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 12C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 54F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 14C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. Low near 50F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 13C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 56F. S winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 13C. E winds shifting to NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 56F. ENE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 9C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 48F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Foggy early, then partly cloudy later in the day. High 57F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low around 10C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low 49F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies with some morning fog. High 14C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Morning fog, then mostly cloudy in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. Low 9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low 48F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 58F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Low 9C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low 49F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 58F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 9C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 49F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High around 15C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 58F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 9C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy late. Low 49F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High 14C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine in the morning giving way to clouds and a few showers during the afternoon. High 58F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 9C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 48F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
